jobprofile: The mission statement of the Communication Department is: building bridges of hope. This we will accomplish by reaching the diverse church audiences, both within and externally, with an open, responsible, and hope- filled communication program. We will effectively use contemporary technologies and methods of communication & Public Relations. The desired effect of our vision and activities is to create a favorable image of the church, its mission, life and activities, and witness that many will become followers of Christ and become members of this, His church.
